name: Goblin-Like
description:
A small Roguelike with a Goblin protagonist.

You and a growing party of goblin explore an abandoned dwarven fortress, collecting items and experience points along the way. The final boss can be reached in a half hour, but your initial playthroughs will be considerably shorter. In the grand roguelike tradition, levels are different each time and death is permanent, but the game will auto-save if you need to close your browser; Come back any time to pick up where you left off. Just Remember:

  • Rest after every fight.
  • Treat your companions well.
  • Kill mold before it gets out of hand.
  • The best time to experiment with potions is when you're healthy and safe.
  • When all is lost, throw your inventory at it!

Good luck and, if you have a good run, comment with the name of your goblin!
